item.title: Sarah add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "dont be afraid of death, be afraid of the unlived life." -- Natalie Babbitt

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "Many people die at twenty five and aren't buried until they are seventy five." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Betty Friedan
item.description: "It is easier to live through someone else than to complete yourself. The freedom to lead and plan your own life is frightening if you have never faced it before. It is frightening when a woman finally realizes that there is no answer to the question 'who am I' except the voice inside herself." -- Betty Friedan
